thread.title: Ty Segall Explains Why He Doesn’t Want His Music On Streaming Services

author: Stereogum
title: Ty Segall Explains Why He Doesn’t Want His Music On Streaming Services
text: The ridiculously prolific garage-rock king Ty Segall recently released a new self-titled album , but that album, like much of his vast discography, isn't available on streaming services like Spotify or Apple Music. Part of that is because he's signed to Drag City, who steadfastly refuse to stream any of their catalog, and part of … More »
